Archivo original: SONUS-HOST-MIB

--
-- This SMIv2 module has been generated by smidump 0.2-cvs. Do not edit.
--
SONUS-HOST-MIB DEFINITIONS ::= BEGIN
IMPORTS
Counter64, Integer32, MODULE-IDENTITY, NOTIFICATION-TYPE, 
OBJECT-TYPE, Unsigned32
FROM SNMPv2-SMI
DisplayString
FROM SNMPv2-TC
sonusEventClass, sonusEventDescription, sonusEventLevel, 
sonusEventTime
FROM SONUS-COMMON-MIB
sonusSystemMIBs
FROM SONUS-SMI;
sonusHostMIB MODULE-IDENTITY
LAST-UPDATED    "200811210000Z"
ORGANIZATION    
"Sonus Networks, Inc."
CONTACT-INFO    
"   Customer Support    
Sonus Networks, Inc.
250 Apollo Drive
Chelmsford, MA 01824
USA
Tel: 978-614-8100
Fax: 978-614-8609"
DESCRIPTION     
"The MIB Module for application host monitoring related objects."
::= { sonusSystemMIBs 12 }
sonusHostMIBObjects OBJECT IDENTIFIER
::= { sonusHostMIB 1 }
sonusHostNotifications OBJECT IDENTIFIER
::= { sonusHostMIB 2 }
sonusHostNotificationsPrefix OBJECT IDENTIFIER
::= { sonusHostNotifications 0 }
sonusHostResourceObjects OBJECT IDENTIFIER
::= { sonusHostMIB 3 }
sonusHostCpuID OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          DisplayString
MAX-ACCESS      read-only
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"CPU identifier."
::= { sonusHostResourceObjects 1 }
sonusHostExecName OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          DisplayString
MAX-ACCESS      read-only
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Executable name."
::= { sonusHostResourceObjects 2 }
sonusHostFileSystemPath OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          DisplayString
MAX-ACCESS      read-only
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"File system path name."
::= { sonusHostResourceObjects 3 }
sonusHostProcessID OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          Unsigned32
MAX-ACCESS      read-only
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Process ID."
::= { sonusHostResourceObjects 4 }
sonusHostManagementObjects OBJECT IDENTIFIER
::= { sonusHostMIB 4 }
sonusHostClrSet OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          INTEGER { clear(0), set(1) }
MAX-ACCESS      read-only
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Alarm clear and set flag for an event."
::= { sonusHostManagementObjects 1 }
sonusHostExpectedInstanceCount OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          Unsigned32
MAX-ACCESS      read-only
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Expected number of application instances."
::= { sonusHostManagementObjects 2 }
sonusHostSampleInstanceCount OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          Unsigned32
MAX-ACCESS      read-only
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Actual number of application instance from 
sampling poll."
::= { sonusHostManagementObjects 3 }
sonusHostThresholdTriggerValue OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          Counter64
MAX-ACCESS      read-only
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Threshold trigger value."
::= { sonusHostManagementObjects 4 }
sonusHostThresholdSampleValue OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          Counter64
MAX-ACCESS      read-only
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Actual sampling value that trigger a threshold-crossing event."
::= { sonusHostManagementObjects 5 }
sonusHostThresholdName OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          DisplayString
MAX-ACCESS      read-only
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Threshold name configured for a threshold-crossing notification."
::= { sonusHostManagementObjects 6 }
sonusHostID OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          OCTET STRING (SIZE(1..32))
MAX-ACCESS      read-only
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"The unique id or serial number for this host. The serial number is an ASCII representation of the hardware-specific serial number of the physical machine. It may contain non-numeric characters."
::= { sonusHostManagementObjects 7 }
sonusHostDiskDevName OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          OCTET STRING (SIZE(1..32))
MAX-ACCESS      read-only
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Disk device name in descriptive format. Example: cXtYdZ"
::= { sonusHostManagementObjects 8 }
sonusHostDiskErrorCount OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          Unsigned32
MAX-ACCESS      read-only
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Error count representing the difference between last and present polled value."
::= { sonusHostManagementObjects 9 }
sonusHostResourceUsageStats OBJECT IDENTIFIER
::= { sonusHostMIB 5 }
sonusHostCpuAvgUsage OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          Integer32
MAX-ACCESS      read-only
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"CPU usage as percentage.  Total CPU time is the sum of 4 values: user time, kernel time, IO-wait time, and idle time.  Each time value is calculated by taking the difference between present and the previous samples.  The sampling period is 5 seconds.  Usage is calculated using this formula: (user time+kernel time)/(user time+kernel time+IO-wait time+idle time)*100.  The value is round up to an integer. The calculation is performed for each CPU, and the usage value is the average."
::= { sonusHostResourceUsageStats 1 }
sonusHostMemUsage OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          Integer32
MAX-ACCESS      read-only
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Host physical memory usage as percentage.  Usage value is calculated by dividing total in-use memory by total physical memory in the system.  Usage value is represented in percentage and round up to an integer.  Sampling period is 5 seconds.  "
::= { sonusHostResourceUsageStats 2 }
sonusHostSwapSpaceUsage OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          Integer32
MAX-ACCESS      read-only
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Host swap space usage as percentage.  Usage value is calculated by dividing total in-use swap space by total available swap space.  Usage value is represented in percentage and it is round up to an integer.  Sampling period is 5 seconds. "
::= { sonusHostResourceUsageStats 3 }
sonusHostFsUsageTable OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          SEQUENCE OF SonusFileSystemUsageEntry
MAX-ACCESS      not-accessible
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Host File System Usage Table."
::= { sonusHostResourceUsageStats 4 }
sonusFileSystemUsageEntry OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          SonusFileSystemUsageEntry
MAX-ACCESS      not-accessible
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"File System Usage table entry."
INDEX           { sonusHostFileSystemPathName }
::= { sonusHostFsUsageTable 1 }
SonusFileSystemUsageEntry ::=
SEQUENCE {
sonusHostFileSystemPathName     DisplayString,
sonusHostFileSystemUsage        Integer32
}
sonusHostFileSystemPathName OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          DisplayString
MAX-ACCESS      read-only
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"File System Path Name."
::= { sonusFileSystemUsageEntry 1 }
sonusHostFileSystemUsage OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          Integer32
MAX-ACCESS      read-only
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"File System Usage as percentage.  Usage value is calculated by dividing disk space in use by total available space in a file system.  Usage value is represented in percentage and round up to an integer.  Sampling period is 60 seconds."
::= { sonusFileSystemUsageEntry 2 }
sonusHostApplResUsageTable OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          SEQUENCE OF SonusApplResUsageEntry
MAX-ACCESS      not-accessible
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Host application resource usage Table."
::= { sonusHostResourceUsageStats 5 }
sonusApplResUsageEntry OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          SonusApplResUsageEntry
MAX-ACCESS      not-accessible
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"File System Usage table entry."
INDEX           { sonusHostApplPID }
::= { sonusHostApplResUsageTable 1 }
SonusApplResUsageEntry ::=
SEQUENCE {
sonusHostApplPID                Unsigned32,
sonusHostApplExecName           DisplayString,
sonusHostApplCpuUsage           Integer32,
sonusHostApplMemSize            Unsigned32,
sonusHostApplVMSize             Unsigned32
}
sonusHostApplPID OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          Unsigned32
MAX-ACCESS      read-only
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Application process ID (PID)."
::= { sonusApplResUsageEntry 1 }
sonusHostApplExecName OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          DisplayString
MAX-ACCESS      read-only
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Application executable name."
::= { sonusApplResUsageEntry 2 }
sonusHostApplCpuUsage OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          Integer32
MAX-ACCESS      read-only
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Application CPU usage as percentage.  Usage value is round up to an integer.  CPU usage is collected from the process table in operating system kernel. Sampling period is 30 seconds. "
::= { sonusApplResUsageEntry 3 }
sonusHostApplMemSize OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          Unsigned32
MAX-ACCESS      read-only
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Application physical memory size in kbytes.  Usage value is collected from process table in operating system kernel.  Sampling period is 30 seconds."
::= { sonusApplResUsageEntry 4 }
sonusHostApplVMSize OBJECT-TYPE
SYNTAX          Unsigned32
MAX-ACCESS      read-only
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Application virtual memory usage size in kbytes.  Usage value is collected from process table in operating system kernel.  Sampling period is 30 seconds."
::= { sonusApplResUsageEntry 5 }
sonusHostCpuUsageRisingThresholdNotification NOTIFICATION-TYPE
OBJECTS         { sonusHostCpuID, sonusHostThresholdTriggerValue, 
sonusHostThresholdSampleValue, sonusEventTime, 
sonusEventDescription, sonusEventClass, 
sonusEventLevel, sonusHostClrSet, 
sonusHostThresholdName, sonusHostID }
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Reports a CPU usage exceeds a predefind 
threshold value."
::= { sonusHostNotificationsPrefix 1 }
sonusHostCpuUsageFallingThresholdNotification NOTIFICATION-TYPE
OBJECTS         { sonusHostCpuID, sonusHostThresholdTriggerValue, 
sonusHostThresholdSampleValue, sonusEventTime, 
sonusEventDescription, sonusEventClass, 
sonusEventLevel, sonusHostClrSet, 
sonusHostThresholdName, sonusHostID }
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Reports a CPU usage falls below a predefind 
threshold value."
::= { sonusHostNotificationsPrefix 2 }
sonusHostCpuAvgUsageRisingThresholdNotification NOTIFICATION-TYPE
OBJECTS         { sonusHostThresholdTriggerValue, 
sonusHostThresholdSampleValue, sonusEventTime, 
sonusEventDescription, sonusEventClass, 
sonusEventLevel, sonusHostClrSet, 
sonusHostThresholdName, sonusHostID }
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Report average CPU usage exceeds a threshold 
value."
::= { sonusHostNotificationsPrefix 3 }
sonusHostCpuAvgUsageFallingThresholdNotification NOTIFICATION-TYPE
OBJECTS         { sonusHostThresholdTriggerValue, 
sonusHostThresholdSampleValue, sonusEventTime,

sonusHostThresholdName, sonusHostID }

DESCRIPTION

value."

sonusEventDescription, sonusEventClass,

STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION

sonusEventDescription, sonusEventClass, 
sonusEventLevel, sonusHostClrSet, 
sonusHostThresholdName, sonusHostID }

DESCRIPTION

::= { sonusHostNotificationsPrefix 10 }
sonusHostApplicationRuntimeErrorNotification NOTIFICATION-TYPE
OBJECTS         { sonusHostExecName, sonusHostExpectedInstanceCount, 
sonusHostSampleInstanceCount, sonusEventTime, 
sonusEventDescription, sonusEventClass, 
sonusEventLevel, sonusHostID }
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Reports runtime errors occur by detecting
the number of application running instances 
does not match the expected number."
::= { sonusHostNotificationsPrefix 11 }
sonusHostApplicationRuntimeErrorRecoverNotification NOTIFICATION-TYPE
OBJECTS         { sonusHostExecName, sonusHostExpectedInstanceCount, 
sonusHostSampleInstanceCount, sonusEventTime, 
sonusEventDescription, sonusEventClass, 
sonusEventLevel, sonusHostID }
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Informs the runtime errors report previously 
is recovered."
::= { sonusHostNotificationsPrefix 12 }
sonusHostApplicationExitNotification NOTIFICATION-TYPE
OBJECTS         { sonusHostExecName, sonusHostProcessID, 
sonusEventTime, sonusEventDescription, 
sonusEventClass, sonusEventLevel, sonusHostID }
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Reports a previously running application 
exits."
::= { sonusHostNotificationsPrefix 13 }
sonusHostApplicationStartupNotification NOTIFICATION-TYPE
OBJECTS         { sonusHostExecName, sonusHostProcessID, 
sonusEventTime, sonusEventDescription, 
sonusEventClass, sonusEventLevel, sonusHostID }
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Informs an application just starts up."
::= { sonusHostNotificationsPrefix 14 }
sonusHostApplCpuUsageRisingThresholdNotification NOTIFICATION-TYPE
OBJECTS         { sonusHostExecName, sonusHostThresholdTriggerValue, 
sonusHostThresholdSampleValue, sonusHostProcessID, 
sonusEventTime, sonusEventDescription, 
sonusEventClass, sonusEventLevel, sonusHostClrSet, 
sonusHostThresholdName, sonusHostID }
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Reports an application's instance usage exceeds 
a given threhold value."

sonusEventTime, sonusEventDescription,

::= { sonusHostNotificationsPrefix 16 }
sonusHostApplMemUsageRisingThresholdNotification NOTIFICATION-TYPE
OBJECTS         { sonusHostExecName, sonusHostThresholdTriggerValue, 
sonusHostThresholdSampleValue, sonusHostProcessID, 
sonusEventTime, sonusEventDescription, 
sonusEventClass, sonusEventLevel, sonusHostClrSet, 
sonusHostThresholdName, sonusHostID }
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Reports an application instance's memory usage
exceeds a given threshold value."
::= { sonusHostNotificationsPrefix 17 }
sonusHostApplMemUsageFallingThresholdNotification NOTIFICATION-TYPE
OBJECTS         { sonusHostExecName, sonusHostThresholdTriggerValue, 
sonusHostThresholdSampleValue, sonusHostProcessID, 
sonusEventTime, sonusEventDescription, 
sonusEventClass, sonusEventLevel, sonusHostClrSet, 
sonusHostThresholdName, sonusHostID }
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Reports an application instance's memory usage
falls below a given threshold value."
::= { sonusHostNotificationsPrefix 18 }
sonusHostDiskMonSoftErrorNotification NOTIFICATION-TYPE
OBJECTS         { sonusEventTime, sonusEventDescription, 
sonusEventClass, sonusEventLevel, sonusHostID, 
sonusHostDiskDevName, sonusHostDiskErrorCount }
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Reports that the soft error count for the disk 
identified by sonusHostDiskDevName has increased by 
the value of sonusHostDiskErrorCount since the  
last poll."
::= { sonusHostNotificationsPrefix 19 }
sonusHostDiskMonHardErrorNotification NOTIFICATION-TYPE
OBJECTS         { sonusEventTime, sonusEventDescription, 
sonusEventClass, sonusEventLevel, sonusHostID, 
sonusHostDiskDevName, sonusHostDiskErrorCount }
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Reports that the soft error count for the disk 
identified by sonusHostDiskDevName has increased by 
the value of sonusHostDiskErrorCount since the  
last poll."
::= { sonusHostNotificationsPrefix 20 }
sonusHostDiskMonTransportErrorNotification NOTIFICATION-TYPE
OBJECTS         { sonusEventTime, sonusEventDescription, 
sonusEventClass, sonusEventLevel, sonusHostID, 
sonusHostDiskDevName, sonusHostDiskErrorCount }
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"Reports that the transport error count for the disk 
identified by sonusHostDiskDevName has increased by 
the value of sonusHostDiskErrorCount since the  
last poll."
::= { sonusHostNotificationsPrefix 21 }
sonusHostDiskMonSMARTErrorNotification NOTIFICATION-TYPE
OBJECTS         { sonusEventTime, sonusEventDescription, 
sonusEventClass, sonusEventLevel, sonusHostID }
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"SMARTmon error was reported.  Detailed error is specified in sonusEventDescription."
::= { sonusHostNotificationsPrefix 22 }
sonusHostDiskMonSMARTWarnNotification NOTIFICATION-TYPE
OBJECTS         { sonusEventTime, sonusEventDescription, 
sonusEventClass, sonusEventLevel, sonusHostID }
STATUS          current
DESCRIPTION     
"SMARTmon warning was reported.  Detailed message is specified in sonusEventDescription."
::= { sonusHostNotificationsPrefix 23 }
END -- end of module SONUS-HOST-MIB.
